name: Tink AB
goal:
Tink is a free private finance app that helps you keep track of your money. You simply connect your financial services to Tink which automatically categorizes and analyzes your spending continuously over time. You can also pay your bills and make transfers from your different banks – directly in Tink. With over 350,000 users in Sweden.
Tinks goals are to provide its users with Personal Finance Management. Through Tinks services the user are able to keep track of her financial situation. The service aggregates information from the a various number of banks to provide the user with a complete view of the financial situation, no matter which bank she has.
In addition, Tink also provides the user the possibility to make transfers between bank accounts and pay bills through the Tink app.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives:
We closely follow Payment Service Directive 2 and all legislation relating to it, such as the Regulatory Technical Standard developed by European Banking Authority.
GDPR is also very relevant for us.
